meanings.definition: In a manner related to the breakdown of proteins
meanings.sent1: The enzymes acted proteolytically, breaking down the proteins efficiently.
meanings.sent2: She studied how the stomach proteolytically digests the food we eat.
meanings.sent3: The chef's blender worked proteolytically, turning the meat into a smooth paste.
meanings.sent4: Time seemed to move proteolytically, breaking down memories into fragments.
meanings.sent5: The waves crashed proteolytically against the shore, eroding the rocks slowly.

meanings.definition: Relating to the process of protein digestion
meanings.sent1: The proteolytically active enzymes helped in the digestion of proteins.
meanings.sent2: The proteolytically treated meat was easier to digest.
meanings.sent3: The proteolytically enhanced formula made the protein shake taste better.
meanings.sent4: Her proteolytically modified diet improved her overall health.
meanings.sent5: The proteolytically designed meal plan aided in muscle recovery after workouts.
